17 saha 18 dedina thula mahanuwara nagaraye pawathwini.rathri 7.30 sita eelaga dinaye pandara wana thuru mema krida sanakeliya pawathwunu athara ehi dhawana pathaya wati thibune shri dalada maligawa abiyasini.polispathithuma hamu wu buddharakkhitha himi me sambandhawa siya aprasadaya palakota thibu athara mahanuwara nagaraya pujaniya nagarayak bawath ee karuna nothaka atham deshapalakayan pirisak wisin kshanikawa mudal upayanu was mema tharaga sanwidhanaya kota thibena bawath ehidi unwahanse chodana kala bawa madhya wisin wartha kara thibuni.me pilibada unwahanse janadhipathiwarayata paminili kala kalhi thama ewani tharagawaliyak pawathwanneda yanna gana nodanna bawata hethema mahanayaka himita prakasha kala bawa marthu 16 dina da ayiland puwathpatha wartha kaleya.

'bisnas karanna ba' aya wayen anathuruwa aanduwen karana lada illimata prathicharayak washayen pudgalika prayojanaya sandaha aanayanaya karana lada wahanawalata badu sahanayak laba dun namuth, wyaparikayanta ema sahanaya laba nodima wahana mese sirawimata hethuwa bawayi ohu pawasanne.

manowidyawe di pradhana washayen wiwidha pudgalayanta aadesha kala haki swakiya thathwakaraye muladharma nathahoth bahira pudgala gathi
kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath lal ranasinha bandara mahatha withthiye nithignyawarayata danwa sitiye mema mulika wirodhatha likhithawa idiripath kirimata piyawara ganna lesayi.
